column4: i got a problem with my laptop, the graphic card (ATI M200) is not working properly....
i got a problem with my laptop, the graphic card (ATI M200) is not working properly.... can anyone help me? i got no idea where to get the drivers.
i got a problem with my laptop, the graphic card (ATI M200) is not working properly.... can anyone help me? i got no idea where to get the drivers.
m200 isnt supported through fglrx right?
i think ATI droppped support for that chip or sumthing
no idea....
the opensource driver will give you 2D suport though
Mirro:
dropped? like, i got no chance to use it properly now???
no, man, that's not working ok with the open source drivers, it does not
Pretty much, unless you find a older version of fglrx somewhere on the internet.
same problem on windows nowdays too
no, actually not, I use m200 with my XP and its going alright
using an old driver still
mb
so, where can i find those old drivers? any idea?
just google for something like fglrx version 8.24 or something, and youll have 3d support
thanx!
i found the driver you need
http://ati.amd.com/support/drivers/linux/linux-radeon-prer200.html
and here you have how to install them https://help.ubuntu.com/community/BinaryDriverHowto/ATI#head-99489608eb537a1a0346cdd3ad34209d7887714a
